StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: GWA Study of Oral Cavity, Pharynx and Larynx Cancers in European, and North and South American Populations - CIDR

Person.Organization: UNIVERSITY OF MICHIGAN AT ANN ARBORINTERNATIONAL AGENCY FOR RES ON CANCER
INTERNATIONAL AGENCY FOR RES ON CANCER

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: University of Pittsburgh head and neck cancer study: grants US NIH P50CA097190, P30CA047904 and R01DE025712; Carolina Head and Neck Cancer Study (CHANCE): R01CA90731. HN5000 study: NIHR RP-PG-0707-10034; IROPICAN study: National Institute for Medical Research Development (NIMAD) (grant number: 940045); Toronto Study: the Canadian Cancer Society Research Institute (020214) and NCI U19CA148127; Sudbury study: The Northern Cancer Foundation; ARCAGE study: European Commission's 5th Framework Program (QLK1-2001-00182), FIRMS, Region Piemonte, and Padova University (CPDA057222). IARC Latin American study: European Commission INCO-DC IC18-CT97-0222, Fondo para la Investigacion Cientifica y Tecnologica (Argentina) and Fundação de Amparo à Pesquisa do Estado de São Paulo (01/01768-2). EPIC study: European Commission (DG SANCO) and IARC. InterCHANGE: IARC.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Controlled-access (GSR are sensitive according to the Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Head and Neck Cancer)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-HNC
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Head and Neck Cancer.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cancer.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (IRB, NPU, GSO)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-IRB-NPU-GSO
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data is limited to genetic studies only.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical
ConsentGroup.name: HMB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry.
